name: AbilityToPayForHealthCare
title: Ability to Pay for Health Care
description: Assessment of the person's ability to pay for healthcare, including medical, dental, vision, etc.  (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Ability to Pay for Health Care.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the person's ability to pay for healthcare, including medical, dental, vision, etc. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Ability to Pay for Health Care.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Ability to Pay for Health Care.)

contains.display: How hard is it for you to pay for the very basics like food, housing, medical care, and heating
Have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed in past 1 year [PRAPARE]
Medicine or Any Health Care (Medical, Dental, Mental Health, Vision)
